boat.name: Fionn
boat.full_description:
Fionn was built in Australia by her first owner, who unusually, for a Vertue, fitted her out as a gaff cutter. She sailed in East Coast Australian waters until Steve Woods returned to England, and loved her too much to sell her. He therefore had her shipped to the UK.

In recent years Fionn has been re-splined, and her running and standing rigging renewed. Her bowsprit has been made retractable, and she has had extensive upgrade to her electric systemss including an echo pilot forward looking sonar, marine radio and Weems and Plath instrumentation (inc chonometer and barometer).

Registered Australia 1987 no. 852796
boat.construction_details:
Hull - carvel. Splined and glued full length Philippine mahogony
Deck- laid beech, resin coated and painted
boat.short_description: 'Fionn' was built by Chris Larrewyn in Australia for his own use, and (unusually for a Vertue) given a gaff rig

for_sales.sales_text:
This fine sea going yacht has been well built in Australia to Laurent Giles" Vertue design, and fitted out as a well balanced gaff cutter. She has sailed East Coast Australian waters before being shipped to the UK.

Sails are of good quality tan and white Dacron, with a full suite of 2 mainsails, 2 jibs, a staysail, and a topsail, plus an additional Genoa and spinnaker.

Ground tackle includes a manual gypsy winch, 35lb CQR, and 27lb Danforth anchors plus 25 fathoms of 5/16th chain.

In recent years "Fionn" has been re-splined, and her running and standing rigging renewed. Her bowsprit has been made retractable.

Professionally fitted electronics include an echo pilot forward looking sonar, marine radio  and Weems and Plath instrumentation (inc chonometer and barometer). Electric bilge pump and solar panel.

A new marine head, paraffin double burner stove and separate protected heater are fitted.

Both bunks are fitted with lee clothes and there is space for a pipe cot.

9"6 good quality WalkerBay sailing dinghy, with oars, is included in sale.

Currently laying at the Marine Store yard, Maldon
